https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ycdGHjaQBLRenTSFQeb0oU4yZ5e.jpg After her mother’s death, Amalia learns that her husband is having an affair. But when he mysteriously dies a few days later, the young widow, obsessed by her late husband’s mistress, succumbs to bloodthirsty madness. Amalia
